name: CardanoBoy G2 (trails edition) 1/2
description: Cardano is one of the most ambitious and purpose driven projects in the crypto space. In retro gaming fashion, this is a single edition. I used a combination of Pixel Studio and Procreate on this one. One of several different variants of the CardanoBoy series. This will be the only minting of this specific variant. Find me on Twitter @TheWaldorfJ to get notice when other editions drop.
